conversation_str:
user: hello
assistant: Hello! What would you like me to remind you about?
user: remind me to take out the trash tommorow at 6 pm
assistant: I’ll remind you to take out the trash tomorrow at 6 p.m. [ChatEnded]

user: hello
assistant: Hello! What would you like me to remind you about?
user: I need a reminder to start thawing out dinner today at 5 pm
assistant: I’ll remind you to start thawing out dinner today at 5 p.m. [ChatEnded]

user: please set a reminder to wash my hands after work, I get off around 7 pm
assistant: I can’t reliably detect “after work,” so this reminder isn’t set up yet.

Would you like me to make it a daily reminder at exactly 7:00 p.m.?
user: yes at 7 pm
assistant: I’ll remind you daily at 7:00 p.m. to wash your hands. [ChatEnded]

user: remind me to turn the stove off
assistant: When should I remind you to turn the stove off?
user: when it is on
assistant: Should I remind you every time the stove turns on, or only at a specific time (like “10 minutes after it turns on” or “at 7 p.m.”)?
user: no just when it is on
assistant: Got it—you want a reminder any time the stove is on.

To set this up as a reminder, do you want it:
- every time the stove turns on, or  
- just the first time it turns on each day?
user: every time
assistant: You’ll get a reminder to turn the stove off every time it is on. [ChatEnded]

user: please remind me to take my medication everyday at 7 pm
assistant: I’ll remind you to take your medication every day at 7 p.m. [ChatEnded]

user: send a daily message to my mom to eat breakfast and call me at 9:40 am
assistant: I’ll remind you every day at 9:40 a.m. to send a message to your mom to eat breakfast and call you. [ChatEnded]

user: Please create a reminder to check the microwave everyday at 7pm
assistant: I’ll remind you every day at 7 p.m. to check the microwave. [ChatEnded]

user: i have a vist next week for my cat strawberry
assistant: What day and time next week should I remind you about your visit for Strawberry?
user: tuesday night for the appointment Wednesday morning 9 am
assistant: I’ll remind you about the visit for your cat Strawberry next Tuesday night, before your Wednesday 9 a.m. appointment. [ChatEnded]

user: I need a reminder to turn the stove off before I start my errands in the morning
assistant: I’ll remind you to turn the stove off.  

About when should the reminder go off in the morning—for example, at a specific time like 8:30 a.m., or some minutes before you usually leave for your errands?
user: when I start my errands in the morning
assistant: So I set the reminder to go off right when you start your errands.

To make sure it can actually trigger, what clock time should I use—for example, about what time do you usually start your errands in the morning?
user: i start them at 8 am
assistant: I’ll remind you to turn the stove off at 8 a.m. [ChatEnded]

user: I need to set reminders for my mom sarah
assistant: What would you like the reminders to be about for your mom Sarah?
user: to eat breakfast I brought her
assistant: When should I remind your mom Sarah to eat breakfast you brought her?
user: breakfast time
assistant: Should the reminder go off at a specific clock time (like 8 a.m.), or just when it’s usually “breakfast time” for her?
user: breakfast time
assistant: Is there a usual clock time that “breakfast time” happens for her (for example, around 8 a.m.), or would you like me to set it at 8 a.m. by default?
user: 8 am
assistant: I’ll remind your mom Sarah to eat the breakfast you brought her at 8 a.m. [ChatEnded]

user: remind me to go to the gym in 1 hour
assistant: I’ll remind you to go to the gym in 1 hour. [ChatEnded]

user: remind me to turn the stove off when it is on
assistant: I can’t set it to “when it is on” directly; that isn’t feasible as a reminder.

Would you like me to:
- remind you **when the stove turns on**,  
- **when the stove turns off**, or  
- at **a specific time each day** (for example, around your usual dinner time)?
user: when the stove turns on
assistant: I’ll remind you to turn the stove off when the stove turns on. [ChatEnded]

user: I have a vet visit next week for my cat strawberry
assistant: What day and time would you like me to remind you *before* the vet visit next week?
user: tuesday night for the appointment wednesday 9 am
assistant: Your reminder is set for before the appointment, but I need a specific time to make it work.

What time on Tuesday night would you like the reminder?  
(For example: 7:00 pm, 8:00 pm, or 9:00 pm.)
user: 10 pm
assistant: I’ll remind you about the vet visit for your cat Strawberry next Tuesday at 10 pm. [ChatEnded]

user: im always get distracted after I microwave my food and it gets cold
assistant: It sounds like you’d like a reminder to eat your food before it gets cold.

What exactly should the reminder say or be about—for example, “remind me to take my food out and eat after the microwave finishes”?
user: remind me to take my food out of the microwave finishes
assistant: I’ll remind you to take your food out of the microwave.

When should the reminder happen—right when the microwave finishes, or a little bit before/after?
user: right after
assistant: I’ll remind you to take your food out of the microwave right after the microwave finishes. [ChatEnded]

user: remind me to wash my hands when I get home from work
assistant: I can’t set it for “when I get home from work” as-is.

Would you like this reminder:
- when you arrive home,
- when the front door opens,  
or  
- at a specific time like 6:00 p.m. on weekdays?
user: when I arrive home
assistant: I’ll remind you to wash your hands when you arrive home. [ChatEnded]

user: I need a reminder to take my supplements after i eat dinner but before bedtime... everyday
assistant: I’ll remind you every day to take your supplements after dinner but before bedtime, between 8:00 p.m. and 10:30 p.m. [ChatEnded]

user: I need a reminder to take my supplements after i eat dinner but before bedtime... everyday
assistant: I’ll remind you every day to take your supplements after dinner but before bedtime. [ChatEnded]

user: i need you to create a reminder to help me remember to eat dinner
assistant: I can remind you to eat dinner.  

When would you like this reminder? (For example, a specific time like 6:30 p.m., or a general time like “in the evening.”)
user: 9:25 pm
assistant: I’ll remind you to eat dinner at 9:25 p.m. [ChatEnded]

user: Generate for me a reminder so that when I place food in my microwave it reminds me when it is done
assistant: I can remind you when your microwaved food is done.  

When should the reminder go off: as soon as the microwave finishes, or a certain time before/after that?
user: as soon as it finishes
assistant: I’ll remind you when your microwaved food is done, as soon as the microwave finishes. [ChatEnded]

user: hello
assistant: Hello! What would you like me to remind you about?
user: to eat breakfast
assistant: Okay, I’ll remind you to eat breakfast.  

When would you like the reminder? For example, a specific time like “8 a.m.” or a time of day like “in the morning.”
user: today
assistant: I need a more specific time than “today.”

What time today should I remind you to eat breakfast?
user: 8 am today
assistant: I’ll remind you to eat breakfast today at 8:00 a.m. [ChatEnded]

user: once
assistant: What would you like to be reminded about once?
user: take my supplements
assistant: When should I remind you to take your supplements?
user: tomorrow
assistant: I’ll remind you to take your supplements tomorrow. [ChatEnded]

user: hello
assistant: Hello! What would you like me to remind you about?
user: hello
assistant: Hello! What would you like me to be remind you about?
user: to put my stove off
assistant: Got it—I’ll remind you to turn your stove off.

When should I remind you? For example, after a certain time, before bedtime, or at a specific clock time?
user: when it is on
assistant: Right now I can’t set a reminder for “when it is on” — I need a specific time or period.

When would you like the reminder, for example:
- every day at a certain time (e.g., 9 p.m.), or  
- after a certain amount of time the stove has been on (e.g., 30 minutes after you start cooking)?  

Please tell me which you prefer and the time.
user: at 9 pm
assistant: I’ll remind you to put your stove off at 9 p.m. [ChatEnded]

user: remind me to start doing my laundry after lunch
assistant: I’ll remind you to start doing your laundry at 1:15 p.m., after lunch. [ChatEnded]
